alert.note: Alert for NCC000 (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued December 31 at 3:14PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...EAS CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY... THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF FL. THE DAVIDSON COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IS SEARCHING FOR KATELYNN JOE SHARPE. KETELYNN IS A 14 YEAR OLD WHITE FEMALE APPROXIMATELY 5 FEET 3 INCHES TALL WEIGHING 260 POUNDS. SHE HAS BLACK HAIR AND BROWN EYES. KATELYNN WAS LAST SEEN WEARIN GA BLUE HOODIE BLUE JEANS AND WHITE VANNS TENNIS SHOES. KATELYNN ALSO MAY HAVE IN HER POSSESSION A SALMON BOOKBAG AND A WII CONSOLE. NO ABDUCTOR INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE AT THIS TIME OTHER THAN KATELYNN WAS SEEN GETTING INTO A SILVER FORD TARUS. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION CALL DAVIDSON COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IMMEDIATELY AT 336-252-2105 OR DIAL 911 OR DIAL STARHP. ACTIVATE CMAS IN REGION 7
